With feet together, hop to your left onto your left foot toward 11 o'clock and deliver a right knee kick to opponent's solar plexus. Simultaneously deliver a right inward downward hammer fist to opponent's right kidney.
With the momentum forcing you back, drop back with your right foot forward 8 o'clock into a left neutral bow and deliver a left inward overhead elbow strike to the upper spine of opponent.
Immediately slide your left foot counter clockwise to 8 o'clock and deliver a right downward thrusting forearm elbow punch to opponent's left jaw.
Pivot to your left and deliver a right rear scoop kick to opponent's right jaw.
Right front crossover and cover out twice toward 8 o'clock.
